Message.Title: Aapltoidz are getting a little ah reward in exchage for gobz of riskb
Message.Msg: But they are still buried in a trade that iz heading MUCH further south despite aapltiod commitment to everything aapl. What aapltiodz and arguably most sheeple dont understand iz that common stox are in no way associated with a real company or its performance metrics. Publically traded Common stox , all common stox, are no more then unsecured digital credits in a pension fund , 401k, ira, or retail trade account. They are used az a proxy to transfer real wealth from the many to the few az efficiently az possible. You cant eat them, drink them, heat with them, or build shelter with them. Assuming that the market iz functioning during market hourz (a BIG assumption in this flashy crashy robot hacky world we live in), a stox ONLY value iz what the robot or greater fool knucklehead on the other end of the wire will pay you for them at the particular nano second that you attempt a sale. When you think of stox, think of them az a notch below bitcoin. Bit coin would be a notch below AAA bond debt, which iz just a scad below greek debt, which iz minutely below us treasury notes. In all of this,optionz and derivativez are worth absolute zero where the contracts that back them aren't worth the digital print that 'back them' Understand theze concepts and you will be safe from koolaid drinking massez that have been thoroughly brainwashed by the Machine.
